Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Strongman and Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's adventures in a circus, his confrontation with a jealous former strongman, Matto Grasso, and the resolution of their conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Arrival and Initial Performance
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and the town's reaction to the circus arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Initial Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan intervenes in a conflict within the circus tent and confronts Billings, leading to a physical fight and a new threat.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan resolves the threat, learns about Matto Grasso, and receives a job offer from the circus owner.

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Sabotage and Bunyan's Heroism
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso plots and executes revenge by setting the circus tent on fire, but Paul Bunyan heroically intervenes.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaimed Performance and Matto Grasso's Jealousy

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico's Release and Recapture
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso's second revenge attempt involves releasing Gigantico, but Paul Bunyan swiftly recaptures the ape.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Scheme: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico's Escape and Paul Bunyan's Swift Action

sub_scenes.title: Arena Chase and Weight Attack
sub_scenes.description: The chase for Matto Grasso moves into the circus arena, where Matto Grasso attempts to use weights as projectiles.

narrative_arcs.title: Continued Escape and Second Weight Attempt

sub_scenes.title: Final Confrontation and Trapeze Toss
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan confronts Matto Grasso directly in the arena, leading to a physical fight and the dramatic trapeze bar toss.

narrative_arcs.title: Spectator Observation and Paul Bunyan's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Resolution, Job Rejection, and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso is caught, Paul Bunyan is praised and offered a job, but he declines and decides to return to the North Woods.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Bizarre Encounters
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's fantastical adventures, including encounters with a talking severed head, a magical dagger, and a dangerous ogress in Tibet.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Ogress and Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo's Tibetan adventure and a bizarre encounter with a talking severed head.

sub_scenes.title: Sacred Dagger and Journey to Hi-Toun
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo receives a magical dagger and is directed towards Hi-Toun, arriving amidst misinterpreted mourning.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hi-Toun and Misinterpretation of Festivities

sub_scenes.title: King's Plea and Ogress Encounter
sub_scenes.description: The King of Hi-Toun asks Marco Polo for help finding his daughter, leading him to a dangerous encounter with the Ogress of Tibet.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco's Introduction and the King's Welcome
The King's Plea for Help Regarding Princess Lotus
Marco's Agreement to Help Find Princess Lotus
Encounter with a Mourning Woman in Need
The Mourning Woman's Plea and the Ominous Destination
Entering the Mysterious Castle and the Rat Revelation
The Ogress's Transformation and Marco's Imprisonment
Confrontation with Giant Rats and the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Royal Reunion
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo escapes the Ogress, helps another captive, and witnesses a joyful royal reunion and marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: The Special Knife and Ogre's Defeat
Escape from Dungeon with Magic Knife
Misunderstood Mourning and Arrival at Palace

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc, introduced by a Treasure Keeper, tells a tale of betrayal, greed, and revenge centered around a hidden treasure in Agra.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper's Introduction and Penal Colony
sub_scenes.description: Introduction by the Treasure Keeper followed by a scene in a British penal colony where a prisoner plots to reveal a treasure's location.

narrative_arcs.title: Officer's Request to Speak with Captain Brooking

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Bargain and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner reveals the treasure to Captain Brooking and makes a deal for escape, only to be betrayed.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of Treasure and Desperate Bargain
The Agreement and Promise of Escape

sub_scenes.title: Years of Imprisonment and Vengeance Vow
sub_scenes.description: The prisoner realizes the betrayal, endures years in prison, and vows revenge upon his release.

narrative_arcs.title: Release from Prison and Return to England
Return to England and Renewed Vengeance

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Deadly Attic Reveal
sub_scenes.description: The prisoner returns to England, confronts Captain Brooking, and the tale shifts to another pair of men and a deadly treasure reveal in an attic.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in England and Continued Vigil
Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Police Investigation and Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: Police investigate the gunshot from the attic, leading to a chase and a moral conclusion by the Treasure Keeper.

narrative_arcs.title: The Wounded Man and the Chest

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the haunted Matthews estate, Henry Northrup's investigation, and the resolution of the vengeful spirit of Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Dr. Styx attacking a woman and the sentencing of Vincent Matthews for murder, setting up the backstory of the haunted estate.

sub_scenes.title: Northrup Accepts the Case
sub_scenes.description: Realtor Dr. Styx pleads with Henry Northrup to investigate the haunted Matthews estate, and Northrup accepts.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Warning at Matthews Place
sub_scenes.description: Henry Northrup arrives at the Matthews estate and receives an ominous warning from Alvin, the groundskeeper.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Matthews Place and Ominous Warning

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Ghostly Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: Ignoring the warning, Northrup enters the house and is immediately confronted by the ghostly figure of Vincent Matthews.

narrative_arcs.title: Ignoring the Warning and Entering the House

sub_scenes.title: Physical and Spiritual Struggle
sub_scenes.description: A physical and verbal struggle ensues between Northrup and the ghostly Vincent Matthews, with Northrup surprisingly gaining the upper hand.

sub_scenes.title: Salvation through Forgiveness and Brotherly Love
sub_scenes.description: The narrative shifts to a philosophical discussion on fear and violence, leading to a path of salvation for Vincent Matthews through his sister's forgiveness and love.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of the Murdered Sister

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Departure of Spirits
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind Matthews appears, forgives her brother, and expresses brotherly love, leading to the release and departure of both spirits from the haunted house.

narrative_arcs.title: Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: The Tragic Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the historical voyages of Henry Hudson in search of the Northwest Passage, culminating in mutiny and his tragic fate.

sub_scenes.title: Commission and Initial Voyage
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Henry Hudson's tragic story and his commission by the Dutch East India Company for a voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Hudson

sub_scenes.title: Voyage, Mutiny Threat, and Course Change
sub_scenes.description: The first voyage faces crew discontent, leading to a threat of mutiny and a change of course to the Hudson River.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Acceptance of Failure and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: A second voyage is launched, taking a northerly route, leading to the ship being ice-bound and eventually to mutiny.

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight Rescues the Princess
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Arabian Knight, Hassan, on a mission to rescue a kidnapped princess from Tatar horsemen led by Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Assignment and Desert Journey
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is tasked by the Caliph to rescue a princess and begins his journey into the desert.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Oasis Discovery: Trail of the Tartars
Encounter and Warning in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Capture at Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: Hassan infiltrates the Tartar camp, finds the princess's location, but is quickly discovered and captured.

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan's Challenge and Hassan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Captured, Hassan faces Kurgan, who proposes a challenge with uncertain stakes, leading to Hassan's internal resolve to win.

narrative_arcs.title: Internal Resolve and Desperate Need to Win

sub_scenes.title: The Contest and Honorable Victory
sub_scenes.description: Hassan fights against Kurgan's warriors, using unconventional tactics to win the challenge honorably.

narrative_arcs.title: Signal for Contest and Hassan's Strategy
Plea for Mercy and Honorable Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Romantic Departure
sub_scenes.description: Hassan and the rescued woman share a farewell, marked by gratitude, unspoken feelings, and a parting kiss before continuing their journey together.

narrative_arcs.title: Imminent Departure and a Parting Kiss
A Fine Reward and Continued Journey
